name: Rapid Racing
description: Rapid Racing is a top-down 2D arcade style racing game - try to beat your best times on the many included levels in singleplayer, or race against friends in multiplayer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
